summary.span: 通过给定的声明集，定义一组用于对用户进行授权的规则。

span.span: Defines a set of rules for authorizing a user, given a set of claims.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口可将一个声明集添加或映射到另一个声明集。Implement the interface to add or map one set of claims to another. 授权策略检查声明集并根据当前声明集添加其他声明。An authorization policy examines a set of claims and adds additional claims based on the current set. 例如，授权策略可评估包含出生日期的声明，添加断言用户超过 21 岁的声明以及将 Over21 声明添加到 中。For example, an authorization policy might evaluate a claim that contains the date of birth and add a claim that asserts that the user is over 21 years old and add an Over21 claim to the . 实现 接口的类不对用户进行授权，但它们可令 类来执行此操作。Classes that implement the interface do not authorize users, but they enable the class to do so. 为每个有效授权策略调用 方法。The calls the method for each authorization policy in effect. 方法根据当前上下文确定是否应为用户添加其他声明。The method determines whether additional claims should be added for the user, based on the current context. 当声明由其他授权策略添加到 时，可多次调用授权策略的 方法。An authorization policy's method may be called multiple times, as claims are added to the by other authorization policies. 当所有有效授权策略都已完成时， 类会根据最终的声明集做出授权决定。When all authorization policies in effect are done, the class makes authorization decisions based upon the final set of claims. 然后， 类会创建一个 ，其中包含反映这些授权决定的不可变声明集。The class then creates an that contains an immutable set of claims that reflects these authorization decisions. ## Examples [!code-csharp[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/vb/myauthorizationpolicy.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 接口的实施者应当要求不同的线程多次调用 方法。Implementers of the interface should expect the method to be called multiple times by different threads. 接口的实施者可使用 `state` 参数在对 方法的多次调用之间跟踪状态。Implementers of the interface can use the `state` parameter to track state between calls to the method. 如果在对 方法的给定调用中设置了状态对象，则会在当前评估过程中向对 方法的每个后续调用传递同一对象实例。If a state object is set inside a given call to the method, the same object instance is passed to each and every subsequent call to the method in the current evaluation process. ## Examples [!code-csharp[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[C_IAuthorizationPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_iauthorizationpolicy/vb/myauthorizationpolicy.vb#2)]
